name: Flappy Santa
description:
Santa is coming to celebrate Christmas with us,  help him  to avoid hitting anything except the cupcakes while flying through villages. How far Santa can travel is depending on you. 

Why Santa is wearing sun glasses? Because he's in Australia and it's bloody hot down under in December~

I hope this game can bring you more Christmas ambience and spirit. It's suitable for everyone from children to adults. Enjoy and Merry Christmas!

Create by: Yongli (Eric) Wang

Special thanks: Manny Vaccaro

bananabizgames@gmail.com

https://itunes.apple.com/au/app/flappy-santa/id1332414731?mt=8
